description: User mode file system library for windows with FUSE Wrapper.

installer.script: Invoke-ExternalCommand msiexec -ArgumentList @('/i', "$dir\setup.msi_", '/qn', '/norestart') -RunAs -ContinueExitCodes @{ 3010 = 'A system reboot is required to finalize the installation.' } | Out-Null

uninstaller.script: Invoke-ExternalCommand msiexec -ArgumentList @('/x', "$dir\setup.msi_", '/qn', '/norestart') -RunAs -ContinueExitCodes @{ 3010 = 'A system reboot is required to finalize the uninstallation.' } | Out-Null
